attributes.action: Families in crisis due to lack of mental health support
attributes.additional_details: If you are a family or patient or has a friend or even someone who you know who's experiencing problems with lack of support and care and feeling you've been let down by the mental health services and wish for something to be done about this issue then we need your support and would urge you to sign our e-petition.

rejection.details: Please resubit this petition stating what action you want the Government to take.
